description:
Convert your videos to any format

MediaHuman Video Converter is designed to make your life easier when you need to convert videos from one format to another or change their quality and size to fit the storage space of your mobile device. It supports most common video formats such as Audio Video Interleaved (AVI), Digital Video, DVD Video, Flash Video (FLV), H.264/MPEG 4, iTunes Video, Matroska Video (MKV), MPEG, QuickTime and much more.
- fixed the problem that converted MP4 files do not play in some video players
- fixed localization of settings dialog
